alert.note: Alert for Camden; Chowan; Pasquotank; Perquimans (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 12 at 8:19PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Camden, Pasquotank, Perquimans and central Chowan Counties through 900 PM EDT... At 819 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Belvidere, or near Winfall, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Winfall around 825 PM EDT. Hertford around 830 PM EDT. Chapanoke around 840 PM EDT. Elizabeth City around 850 PM EDT. Nixonton around 855 PM EDT. Camden, Elizabeth City State University, Weeksville and Whitehall Shores around 900 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Bob White Fork, Gliden, Peach, Parkville, Nicanor, Yeopim Station, Pasquotank, Jacocks, Beach Springs and Light Nixon Fork. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...45 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
